skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sai chalisa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sai Chalisa is a song describing the glory of Sai Baba of Shirdi. It is adapted from Sai Satcharitra which is considered by Sai devotees as a sacred book. Many believe that Sai Baba himself wrote it. Enjoy the nectar of Sai Satcharitra in the form of Sai Chalisa. Sai Chalisa is currently available in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu and Kannada languages. Credits: Sai Chalisa Telugu & Tamil Singer, SaiManasa Divakaruni, Music: Sai Suresh. Sai Chalisa Hindi Singer: Rupesh Kumar. Sai Chalisa Kannada Lyrics & vocal: Rashmi Adish, Music Jayasindoor Rajesh

Sai Chalisa is a part of our popular Shirdi Sai Baba All-In-One App across app stores and is by OmniSai.Org, a US 501(C)(3) Nonprofit Organization. We have App users / Site visitors from 150 countries, 49 states in USA, all 29 states in India and from ~3000 cities Worldwide. The most comprehensive Free "App / Resource For And by Sai Volunteers!". No Ads, No Hidden Agenda! We do not collect user data or monetize through any means. Simply experience the best! We intend to never advertise in our apps or on our website and intend to keep this service always FREE.
